mapper.update:
update
set NAME = #{NAME}, NAME_EN = #{NAME_EN}, BIANMA = #{BIANMA}, DEPARTMENT_ID = #{DEPARTMENT_ID}, FUNCTIONS = #{FUNCTIONS}, TEL = #{TEL}, EMAIL = #{EMAIL}, SEX = #{SEX}, BIRTHDAY = #{BIRTHDAY}, NATION = #{NATION}, JOBTYPE = #{JOBTYPE}, JOBJOINTIME = #{JOBJOINTIME}, FADDRESS = #{FADDRESS}, POLITICAL = #{POLITICAL}, PJOINTIME = #{PJOINTIME}, SFID = #{SFID}, MARITAL = #{MARITAL}, DJOINTIME = #{DJOINTIME}, POST = #{POST}, POJOINTIME = #{POJOINTIME}, EDUCATION = #{EDUCATION}, SCHOOL = #{SCHOOL}, MAJOR = #{MAJOR}, FTITLE = #{FTITLE}, CERTIFICATE = #{CERTIFICATE}, CONTRACTLENGTH = #{CONTRACTLENGTH}, CSTARTTIME = #{CSTARTTIME}, CENDTIME = #{CENDTIME}, ADDRESS = #{ADDRESS}, BZ = #{BZ}, BASESALARY = #{BASESALARY} where STAFF_ID = #{STAFF_ID}
mapper.select:
select a.STAFF_ID, a.NAME, a.NAME_EN, a.BIANMA, a.DEPARTMENT_ID, a.TEL, a.SEX, a.USER_ID, a.BASESALARY, a.CreateTime, b.NAME DNAME from a LEFT JOIN OA_DEPARTMENT b on a.DEPARTMENT_ID = b.DEPARTMENT_ID where 1=1
and ( a.NAME LIKE '%'+#{pd.keywords}+'%' or a.NAME_EN LIKE '%'+#{pd.keywords}+'%' or a.BIANMA LIKE '%'+#{pd.keywords}+'%' )
and a.DEPARTMENT_ID in ${pd.item}
[fhstart]order by a.CreateTime desc[fhend]
select a.USER_ID, a.STAFF_ID, a.NAME, a.BIANMA, a.DEPARTMENT_ID, a.BASESALARY, b.NAME DNAME from a LEFT JOIN OA_DEPARTMENT b on a.DEPARTMENT_ID = b.DEPARTMENT_ID
select a.STAFF_ID, a.NAME, a.BIANMA, a.DEPARTMENT_ID, a.BASESALARY, b.NAME DNAME from a LEFT JOIN OA_DEPARTMENT b on a.DEPARTMENT_ID = b.DEPARTMENT_ID WHERE a.NAME=#{USERNAME}
SELECT COUNT(NAME) NAMENUM FROM OA_STAFF f WHERE f.NAME=#{NAME}

select STAFF_ID,USER_ID, NAME FNAME from
where NAME = #{FNAME}

select top 1000 STAFF_ID,NAME,USER_ID,BIANMA,isnull(NAME,'无名称')+'/'+isnull(USER_ID,'无编号') FSelectOption from f where 1=1
and ( NAME LIKE '%'+ #{KEYWORDS}+'%' or USER_ID LIKE '%'+ #{KEYWORDS}+'%' )
order by f.BIANMA
